instructions: Go to the film or TV episode you want to download from the service, and you will see an arrow icon going down. Tap on that, and the download process will begin. To actually watch your downloaded movies and TV shows, tap on the download arrow icon at the bottom menu of the Disney Plus app You can then see which downloaded films and TV shows are on your device. To begin watching one, tap on the small phone icon at the right of your selected video. You will then see a pop-up menu with two options: Play or Remove Download . Tap Play to begin watching your video, or Remove Download to delete it from your device. If you have multiple videos on the app you want to delete, there s a faster second method. Just tap on the Edit option on the top right of the screen. The phone icons will be replaced by check marks. Tap on the videos you which to download, and when you are done, tap on the garbage can icon on top to remove them all.
